long_description: The Look KeO Plus road pedals are great for entry-level racing, touring and sport riding. Plus, they're a great value. Look KeO Plus road pedals feature a large contact surface and are 1 of the lightest in their category. Specially engineered sealed bearings enhance reliability and precision. Spring adjustment lets you customize release tension from 8 - 12 Nm. Gray KeO cleats are included.
short_description: The Look KeO Plus road pedals are great for entry-level racing, touring and sport riding. Plus, they're a great value.
